subject: Baseball
Mergers, Acquisitions and Divestitures
lead_paragraph: Joe Torre might fit into the growing roster of suitors for the Los Angeles Dodgers, but he said that as of Tuesday, he was “not part of any group” to buy the team.
snippet: Joe Torre might fit into the growing roster of suitors for the Los Angeles Dodgers, but he said that as of Tuesday, he was “not part of any group” to buy the team.
